notes: Art 1-3 define scope for data holders, users, and data sharing services
Art 5 data sharing conditions, Art 8 trade secret protection policies
Art 3-4 require knowledge of data generated by connected products

control_name: Access permissions and authorizations are managed
notes: Art 4-6 define access rights to product data for users and third parties
Art 8 technical measures to protect trade secrets
Art 23 cloud switching requires proper data retrieval and deletion
